This contains all {{SITENAME}} pages that have been flagged as being associated with an error in the FIX Specification.

Specification errors are flagged by contributing a description of the nature of the error to the most relevant 
{{SITENAME}} page.

The description should start with <nowiki>{{SpecError}}</nowiki>. 
This will include a standard heading into the text and also mark the page as belonging to the SpecError category.
